data.rationale:
Ok, Tinkering is because it's just what it is. There are one main
    module Tinkerink::Print and 81 others module Tinkering::Fonts 36 MO
    compressed, fully portable between all kind of system. 520 MO
    uncompressed. Tinkering is also because it use Tk. Why a new root
    level. Let's say that 520 mo is a lot.
